60003.name: Ace Hunter Kreen
60003.text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
60003.flavorText: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

59705.name: Adorable Infestation
59705.text: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
59705.flavorText: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

60143.name: Ancient Void Hound
60143.text: At the end of your turn, steal 1 Attack and Health from all enemy minions.
60143.flavorText: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

59252.name: Archwitch Willow
59252.text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
59252.flavorText: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

59616.name: Argent Braggart
59616.text: Battlecry: Set this minion's Attack and Health to the highest in the battlefield.
59616.flavorText: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

58978.name: Athletic Studies
58978.text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.

59583.name: Blessing of Authority
59583.text: Give a minion +8/+8. It can't attack heroes this turn.
59583.flavorText: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

59188.name: Bloated Python
59188.flavorText: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

59720.name: Blood Herald
59720.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.

59605.name: Boneweb Egg
59605.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
59605.flavorText: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

59207.name: Brain Freeze
59207.text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal 3 damage to it.
59207.flavorText: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

59222.name: Brittlebone Destroyer
59222.text: Battlecry: If your hero's Health changed this turn, destroy a minion.
59222.flavorText: Broke many a leg in drama class.

59619.name: Cabal Acolyte
59619.text: Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
59619.flavorText: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

58782.name: Carrion Studies
58782.text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
58782.flavorText: A good read but a little too much fluff.

59408.name: Ceremonial Maul
59408.text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
59408.flavorText: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

59402.name: Coerce
59402.text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
59402.flavorText: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

59540.name: Combustion
59540.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Any excess damages both neighbors.
59540.flavorText: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

59602.name: Commencement
59602.text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
59602.flavorText: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

59639.name: Cram Session
59639.flavorText: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

58973.name: Crimson Hothead
58973.flavorText: Has a real passion for spelling.

60043.name: Cult Neophyte
60043.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next turn.
60043.flavorText: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

60023.name: Cutting Class
60023.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
60023.flavorText: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

59092.name: Cycle of Hatred
59092.text: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
59092.flavorText: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

59394.name: Demon Companion
59394.flavorText: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

59628.name: Demonic Studies
59628.text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
59628.flavorText: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

58976.name: Devolving Missiles
58976.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemy minions that transform them into ones that cost (1) less.
58976.flavorText: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

59584.name: Devout Pupil
59584.text: Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.

58977.name: Diligent Notetaker
58977.text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
58977.flavorText: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

59623.name: Disciplinarian Gandling
59623.text: After you play a minion, destroy it and summon a 4/4 Failed Student.
59623.flavorText: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

59595.name: Divine Rager
59595.flavorText: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

59690.name: Doctor Krastinov
59690.text: Rush Whenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
59690.flavorText: He is not a medical doctor.

59606.name: Double Jump
59606.text: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
59606.flavorText: The key to every speed run.

58974.name: Draconic Studies
58974.text: Discover a Dragon. Your next one costs (1) less.
58974.flavorText: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

60090.name: Educated Elekk
60090.text: Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
60090.flavorText: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

59627.name: Enchanted Cauldron
59627.text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
59627.flavorText: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

60164.name: Fel Guardians
60164.text: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a friendly minion dies.
60164.flavorText: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

59726.name: Felosophy
59726.text: Copy the lowest Cost Demon in your hand. Outcast: Give both +1/+1.

59000.name: Firebrand
59000.text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
59000.flavorText: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

59038.name: First Day of School
59038.text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
59038.flavorText: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

59911.name: Fishy Flyer
59911.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a 4/3 Ghost with Rush to your hand.
59911.flavorText: Like a fish out of water.

59585.name: Flesh Giant
59585.text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.

59555.name: Forest Warden Omu
59555.flavorText: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

59579.name: Frazzled Freshman
59579.flavorText: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

59001.name: Gibberling
59001.flavorText: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

58791.name: Gift of Luminance
58791.text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a 1/1 copy of it.
58791.flavorText: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

60153.name: Glide
60153.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
60153.flavorText: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

59594.name: Goody Two-Shields
59594.flavorText: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

59553.name: Groundskeeper
59553.text: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
59553.flavorText: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

59539.name: Guardian Animals
59539.text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give them Rush.
59539.flavorText: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

58931.name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
58931.text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
58931.flavorText: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

59587.name: High Abbess Alura
59587.text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
59587.flavorText: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

59410.name: In Formation!
59410.text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
59410.flavorText: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

59691.name: Infiltrator Lilian
59691.text: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
59691.flavorText: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

59221.name: Initiation
59221.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
59221.flavorText: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

59164.name: Instructor Fireheart
59164.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
59164.flavorText: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

59609.name: Jandice Barov
59609.text: Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies when it takes damage.
59609.flavorText: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

61174.name: Keymaster Alabaster
61174.text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, add a copy to your hand that costs (1).
61174.flavorText: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

58980.name: Krolusk Barkstripper
58980.flavorText: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

59452.name: Lake Thresher
59452.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
59452.flavorText: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" "That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

60016.name: Lightning Bloom
60016.flavorText: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

59411.name: Lord Barov
59411.text: Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
59411.flavorText: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

60278.name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
60278.text: Battlecry: Reorder your deck from the highest Cost card to the lowest Cost card.
60278.flavorText: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

59230.name: Magehunter
59230.text: Rush Whenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
59230.flavorText: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

59259.name: Manafeeder Panthara
59259.text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
59259.flavorText: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

59089.name: Marrowslicer
59089.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
59089.flavorText: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

59643.name: Mindrender Illucia
59643.text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's until end of turn.
59643.flavorText: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

59214.name: Molten Blast
59214.text: Deal 2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
59214.flavorText: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

58770.name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
58770.text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
58770.flavorText: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

59163.name: Nature Studies
59163.text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
59163.flavorText: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

59918.name: Ogremancer
59918.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a 2/2 Skeleton with Taunt.
59918.flavorText: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

58971.name: Onyx Magescribe
58971.text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to your hand.
58971.flavorText: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

59449.name: Overwhelm
59449.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
59449.flavorText: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

59456.name: Partner Assignment
59456.text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to your hand.
59456.flavorText: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

59039.name: Pen Flinger
59039.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. Spellburst: Return this to your hand.
59039.flavorText: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

59877.name: Plagiarize
59877.text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
59877.flavorText: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

59948.name: Plagued Protodrake
59948.flavorText: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

59101.name: Playmaker
59101.text: After you play a Rush minion, summon a copy with 1 Health remaining.
59101.flavorText: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

59621.name: Potion of Illusion
59621.text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
59621.flavorText: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

59572.name: Power Word: Feast
59572.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
59572.flavorText: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

59213.name: Primordial Studies
59213.text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
59213.flavorText: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

60004.name: Professor Slate
60004.flavorText: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

59223.name: Raise Dead
59223.text: Deal 3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
59223.flavorText: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

59216.name: Ras Frostwhisper
59216.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
59216.flavorText: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

59947.name: Rattlegore
59947.flavorText: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

58979.name: Reaper's Scythe
58979.text: Spellburst: Also damages adjacent minions this turn.

59601.name: Robes of Protection
59601.flavorText: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

58790.name: Rune Dagger
58790.text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
58790.flavorText: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

59542.name: Runic Carvings
59542.text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
59542.flavorText: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

58796.name: School Spirits
58796.text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.

58794.name: Secret Passage
58794.text: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
58794.flavorText: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

59989.name: Self-Sharpening Sword
59989.text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
59989.flavorText: You no longer have to bring a stack of 2 swords to a test!

59263.name: Shadowlight Scholar
59263.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
59263.flavorText: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

59457.name: Shan'do Wildclaw
59457.text: Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
59457.flavorText: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

60151.name: Shardshatter Mystic
60151.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.

59409.name: Shield of Honor
59409.text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
59409.flavorText: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

58975.name: Shifty Sophomore
58975.text: Stealth Spellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
58975.flavorText: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

59916.name: Smug Senior
59916.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a 5/7 Ghost with Taunt to your hand.
59916.flavorText: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

59914.name: Sneaky Delinquent
59914.text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
59914.flavorText: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

59576.name: Sorcerous Substitute
59576.text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
59576.flavorText: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

59725.name: Soul Shear
59725.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
59725.flavorText: "Just a little off the sides please."

59727.name: Soulciologist Malicia
59727.text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush. ( )
59727.flavorText: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

59732.name: Soulshard Lapidary
59732.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
59732.flavorText: Also known as a soul sequincer.

59253.name: Speaker Gidra
59253.text: Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
59253.flavorText: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

59151.name: Sphere of Sapience
59151.text: At the start of your turn, look at your top card. You can put it on the bottom and lose 1 Durability.
59151.flavorText: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

59724.name: Spirit Jailer
59724.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
59724.flavorText: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

59395.name: Star Student Stelina
59395.text: Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
59395.flavorText: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

59403.name: Steeldancer
59403.text: Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your weapon's Attack.
59403.flavorText: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

59027.name: Steward of Scrolls
59027.flavorText: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

59450.name: Survival of the Fittest
59450.text: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
59450.flavorText: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.

59026.name: Teacher's Pet
59026.flavorText: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

59558.name: Totem Goliath
59558.flavorText: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

59035.name: Tour Guide
59035.flavorText: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

58947.name: Transfer Student
58947.text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
58947.flavorText: Oh, the places you'll go! There is so much to fight! There are boards to be explored. There are dreams to take flight.

59703.name: Trick Totem
59703.text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
59703.flavorText: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

59175.name: Troublemaker
59175.text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.

59233.name: Trueaim Crescent
59233.text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.

59569.name: Turalyon, the Tenured
59569.text: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, set the defender's Attack and Health to 3.
59569.flavorText: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

59614.name: Twilight Runner
59614.flavorText: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

59658.name: Vectus
59658.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
59658.flavorText: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

59753.name: Vilefiend Trainer
59753.flavorText: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

59192.name: Void Drinker
59192.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to gain +3/+3.

59590.name: Voracious Reader
59590.text: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
59590.flavorText: But how much of it is skimming?

59400.name: Vulpera Toxinblade
59400.flavorText: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

59646.name: Wandmaker
59646.text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to your hand.
59646.flavorText: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

59083.name: Wave of Apathy
59083.text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.

59170.name: Wolpertinger
59170.flavorText: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

59036.name: Wretched Tutor
59036.text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
59036.flavorText: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

59002.name: Wyrm Weaver
59002.flavorText: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.
